snippet: Afternoon purchases of oil refinery, mining and technology stocks prevented a third consecutive market decline, but the Dow Jones industrial average lost 0.1 percent.
abstract: Afternoon paring pushes stocks slightly up following steep declines earlier in day, as investors buy stocks in oil refiners, mining companies and technology companies; major indexes remain down for the week.
lead_paragraph: Afternoon purchases of oil refinery, mining and technology stocks prevented a third consecutive market decline, but the Dow Jones industrial average lost 0.1 percent.

headline.main: S.&P. and Nasdaq Finish Higher After Late Gains
headline.print_headline: S.&P. and Nasdaq Finish Higher After Late Gains
